/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a hazy blue, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon time. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, their headlights piercing the haze as they head towards the horizon. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
